about_the_game:
It is a difficult enough to author a book, now, in the interest of "safety", anything mightier than a sword, such as your pen, has been banned. You are fed up with the government intrusions in your life; it is time for a Rebellion!

The local "manager" has hired guards to patrol your subdivision, to keep people safe in their homes in front of their TVs. Meet your neighbors and check on their activities. Avoid the guards, and keep your suspicion low. Find paper and write letters to persuade them to your cause. Explore the area, gain access to the manager's house and confront him. Build enough support to launch a successful Rebellion!

Features

  • Small town filled with places and people to explore
  • Write letters to get people on your side for a rebellion
  • Collect keys to gain access to new areas
  • Collect pens and paper for letter writing
  • Guards on patrol detect and chase you down to escort you back to your home
  • New laws enacted nightly as the government takes away the peoples' freedom
  • Rebel to call everyone to action, ending the game and seeing the results
